name: Research and Records
section_name: Learn about North Dakota research and records.

choices.name: Get started with research for your North Dakota ancestors.

hidden.summary:
• Learn successful research strategies for North Dakota ancestors.
  • Record Finder: Use the Record Finder to determine records for North Dakota research.

text:
1. Introduction: Learn about basic North Dakota research strategies.

    ☆ FS—Basic North Dakota Research Tips and Strategies

  2. Watch this video for ideas on North Dakota research.

    ☆ FS—United States Research: Great Plains Region - North Dakota—1:26

  3. Ancestry: Explore resources for North Dakota research on Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—North Dakota Resources
    ☆ AC—North Dakota State Research Guide, 5 pgs.

  4. Record Finder: Use the North Dakota Record Finder to decide on records to search.

    ☆ FS—North Dakota Record Finder

    5. Additional Records
    1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
    2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
    3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.

    Ethnic
    1. African American: Learn about African Americans in North Dakota in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for North Dakota

    2. Native American: Learn about American Indians in North Dakota in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of North Dakota
Additional Records

1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
  2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
  3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.
Ethnic

1. African American: Learn about African Americans in North Dakota in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for North Dakota

  2. Native American: Learn about American Indians in North Dakota in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of North Dakota

choices.name: Learn about North Dakota state history.

text:

    ☆ History
    ☆ History of North Dakota

name: Archives and Libraries
section_name: Learn about North Dakota archives and libraries.

choices.name: Learn about North Dakota archives and libraries.

hidden.summary:
• Explore statewide and regional collections.
  • Explore books and photos that can be helpful in your research.

hidden.exercises:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for archives and libraries. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

text:
1. Learn about North Dakota archives and libraries in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: North Dakota Archives and Libraries
    ☆ North_Dakota State Archives: Wonderful Local Sources for Genealogical Research

  2. Explore the State Archives and Libraries site for North Dakota.
  3. Explore the North Dakota Dept. of Archives collection.
  4. Explore the Digital Horizons site.
  5. Explore the ☆Books We Own site for North Dakota genealogy publications. Volunteers may be available for lookup services.

hidden.summary:
• Explore city and county directories to find North Dakota ancestors.
  • Discover the different types of information in directories, such as streets, churches, historical info, etc.

hidden.exercises:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for city directories. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

text:
1. Learn about North Dakota city directories in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: North Dakota Directories

  2. Sites: Explore North Dakota city directories on the Ancestor Hunt site.
  3. Find out more about city directories in this research guide from Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—Six Things to Find—3 pgs.

  4. Explore North Dakota city directories on the ☆Ancestry site.
  5. Explore North Dakota ☆historical directories by county.
  6. Explore additional links for North Dakota city directories on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
QUIKLinks

section_name: Learn about North Dakota vital records.

  4. Explore North Dakota birth, marriage, and death records on the ☆AccessGenealogy site.
  5. Explore additional links for North Dakota vital records on the ☆Linkpendium site.

choices.name: There are a number of websites with valuable resources for North Dakota research.

text:
1. Explore links in ☆Cyndi's List.
  2. Explore links in ☆Linkpendium.
  3. Explore links in ☆Genealogylinks.net.
  4. Explore links in ☆LDSGenealogy.com.

choices.name: Use the QUIKLinks (lightning bolts) or North Dakota County links (bottom) to quickly search common record collections for North Dakota.

text: Note : To search records on these sites, you must be registered on the site or be at a FamilySearch Center.

1. In the QUIKLinks, click the link for FamilySearch, Ancestry, Findmypast, or MyHeritage to view the corresponding record collection.
  2. Scroll down near the bottom of this page to see available county records. Click the name of the county for FamilySearch, or A for Ancestry, or L for Linkpendium.

1. In FamilySearch, explore the North Dakota Online Genealogy Records page for a variety of record collections.
  2. In each program (FamilySearch, Ancestry, or Findmypast), explore additional record collections besides the ones listed in QUIKLinks.

name: Get Help
section_name: Get help with your North Dakota research.

choices.name: Use Facebook pages to get answers to your questions.

text:
1. Visit the North Dakota Genealogy Network page on Facebook.
  2. Visit the North Dakota Genealogy page on Facebook.
  3. Visit the North Dakota State Genealogical Society page on Facebook.
  4. Visit the U.S. Midwest Genealogy Research page on Facebook.
  5. See the Genealogy on Facebook list of Facebook groups dedicated to helping with research for North Dakota.

1. Join the RootsChat forum and post questions about North Dakota research.
  2. Explore the North Dakota research mailing lists on Cyndi's List.
  3. Use the ☆Ancestry message boards to read or post questions about North Dakota research.

choices.name: Learn about North Dakota genealogy societies.

hidden.exercises: • * Proficient: Make a list of Facebook groups, mailing lists, and genealogy societies of interest, and then join or subscribe to them.

text:
1. Learn about genealogy societies in North Dakota in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: North Dakota Societies

  3. Explore the State Historical Society for North Dakota.
